name: one tap drift
description:
Racing can be simpler. Or more difficult? Now, you just need a single finger to get everything done.

Avoid hitting the walls.

Hold SCREEN to drift. Make a perfect drift win bonus points. Finish challenge or Collect points to unlock cool new CARs!

Controls： Hold SCREEN to drift

SpacebarStartAnykeysDrift
EscQuit
